articles.author: Ellen Francis
articles.title: NATO launches new naval operation in Baltic sea after severed cables - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Baltic Sentry operation comes amid mounting European fears of sabotage after a string of murky disruptions to underwater cables in the sea that borders Russia.
articles.content: NATO is launching a new patrol and surveillance operation to protect critical infrastructure in the Baltic Sea region bordering Russia, the alliance said Tuesday after several breaches to undersea ca… [+3852 chars]

articles.author: Stephanie Pappas
articles.title: See Mercury's frigid north pole in extraordinary new images from the BepiColombo spacecraft - Livescience.com
articles.description: A joint Japanese-European mission to Mercury just made its sixth flyby of the planet, revealing stunning close-ups of the permanently shadowed craters at Mercury's north pole.
articles.content:
New photos of Mercury's mysterious north pole reveal a glimpse of the permanently dark, frigid craters that may hold ice dozens of feet thick, even though Mercury
 is the closest planet to the sun.… [+2406 chars]
